articles.description: One of the most pocket friendly brand  Realme  has unveiled two smartphones the Realme 9 5G and Realme 9 5G SE  Check the price  specifications and features of the smartphone here
articles.content: New Delhi | Jagran Technology Desk: Chinese smartphone manufacturer Realme launched two new smartphones on Thursday in India -- the Realme 9 5G and Realme 9 5G SE. The company has launched these two … [+1966 chars]
